Ian Wright has insisted that Liverpool forward Diogo Jota is “ready” to establish himself as their leading man in attack.
Jota made his move to Liverpool last summer from Wolves. He had spent three … [+2255 chars]

articles.title: Why the Miami Open title might be the most important of Barty's career - WTA Tennis
articles.description: If there was ever any doubt as to Ashleigh Barty's form, it was put to rest with a telling run to the Miami Open championship.
articles.content:
In the end, there was no proper celebration for Ashleigh Barty. Not even a smile.
She stood on the court, politely applauding as an emotional Bianca Andreescu looked on from the changeover chair. Ba… [+4406 chars]

articles.author: Andrew McGlashan
articles.title: 'An impressive record the girls won't take lightly' - Alyssa Healy on Australia's 22-match winning streak - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Healy admits it's a "special feeling" to have overtaken the record of 21 matches held by Ricky Ponting's team in 2003
articles.content: Australia insist they hadn't spoken about a potential new ODI winning streak of 22 matches and had largely downplayed the topic when asked in the lead-up, but having secured the victory over New Zeal… [+2887 chars]
